title: Soup tureen and stand
description: large four-footed bombe faience tureen; all-over rocaille decoration in carmine, blue-yellow and brown; large rococo scrolls form handles on both ends; lid in shape of large leaf, divided into four quadrants, where small sprays of flowers are found; faience platter with carmine and yellow edge matching tureen; center contains one large carmine rose, and three small sprays of flowers
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John P. Rutherfurd in memory of her father, Mr. Thomas Shevlin
